body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting our support. My name is Jason Roberts and I represent Zenith Hotels. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Rebecca. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm quite disappointed with the lack of amenities provided. The gym was closed during my stay.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear about your experience. Can you please provide me with your room number and the dates of your stay so I can look into this further?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: My room number was two five six and I stayed from February twelfth to February fifteenth.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information. Could you also confirm your email address for me?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Rebecca. I'll investigate this matter and follow up with you shortly. Your feedback is important to us. I appreciate your time today. Is there anything else I can assist you with?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now. Thank you for your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Rebecca. Thank you for reaching out. Have a great day!
